title: [Large-Scale] Improving Project-Based Mathematics Education Through MOOC Design Quality and Learner Assessment

context.additional_context: A mathematics education course for professionals conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, requiring practical project design to enhance workplace applicability.

learning_goals: Learners can design and evaluate a mathematics PBL (Project-Based Learning) process by applying ten instructional design principles
Learners can identify positive/negative elements in peer assessment feedback with 80% accuracy using sentiment analysis tools
Learners can independently develop mathematics problem-solving projects reflecting collaborative, differentiated, and collective knowledge design elements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
